Shadai:
Hello ... My name is Shadai. I'm the Legendary Blacksmith of the Isle of Hell. This place has changed a lot not for the better, so not so long ago I moved from there to a more secure Hein ... The
By the way, I am a great friend of Madame Lavianros. Once upon a time she shared with me her knowledge and experience in the manufacture of magnificent brooches and precious stones, since then I have the art of creating some types of brooches, as well as the ability to crush precious stones into powder!
